channel.title: Data Analysis on Sancar Adali - personal website
channel.description: Recent content in Data Analysis on Sancar Adali - personal website

item.title: Data Fusion from Disparate Dissimilarities and Joint Optimization of Fidelity and Commensurability
item.description: My PhD thesis was on joint embedding of disparate dissimilarities for solving various inference tasks such as transfer learning, match detection and graph matching. I have dealt with various issues such as robustness to noise and compared with alternative approaches such as Canonical Correlational Analysis. Github repo

item.title: Seeded Graph Matching
item.description: This variant of the graph matching problem provides an opportunity for the application of JOFC and also the adaptation of a state-of-the-art graph matching algorithm. My work on this variant of the graph matching problem constituted part of my dissertation research. This work is presented in this and this arxiv papers. The code for the algorithm and analysis is at https://github.com/adalisan/SeededGraphMatch

item.title: XDATA
item.description: DARPA program for organizing big data analysis and visualization efforts. The different data analysis tasks we accomplished are here. See the midpoint presentation and final presentation for the summer workshop.
